entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
